tool.name: Find differentially methylated region (DMR)
tool.command:
dmr.py --control $infile_control --affected $infile_affected --o $outfile
$fisher
--min-window-length $min_window_length --min-delta-methylation $min_delta_methylation #if int($min_single_delta_methylation) != -1: --min-single-delta-methylation $min_single_delta_methylation #end if
--check-last-n $check_last_n
#if int($allow_failed) != -1: --allow-failed $allow_failed #end if
#if int($max_cpg_distance) != -1: --max-cpg-distance $max_cpg_distance #end if
## hyper or hypo output only #if str($output_regions) != 'both': $output_regions #end if

param.name: fisher
param.label: Calculate pvalue (fisher-exact-test) for each calculated window

validator.message: Minimal window length must be positive

param.name: min_delta_methylation
param.label: minimal delta between the two mehylation regions/windows

param.name: min_single_delta_methylation
param.label: minimal delta between two single mehylation sites

param.name: check_last_n
param.label: check last N CpG sites if they fullfill all constraints

validator.message: You need to check at least one site.

param.name: allow_failed
param.label: how many sites are allowed to fail in a row

validator.message: If activated these option must be positive
If activated the maximal CpG distance must be positive

tool.help:
**What it does**
Extract differential methylated regions.
